Class LevelManager

java.lang.Object
pl.gda.pg.elektronikaodpodstaw.levels.LevelManager
public class LevelManager extends Object
Handles the management of levels and stages in game. It provides methods to load levels, navigate between stages, and update the game state.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private static int
    currentLevelIndex
    The index of the current level, adjusted from the global level setting.
    static int
    currentStageIndex
    The index of the current stage within the current level.
    private static boolean
    isAnswerStage
    Indicates whether the current stage is a question-answer stage.

    Starts a new game by resetting all progress and reinitializing the levels.
    void

    Advances to the next stage in the current level or ends the game if it is the final stage.

      Constructs a new instance of the class. Used to initialize the object without any specific parameters or setup.

  • Method Details

    • getCurrentMaxStageIndex

      public static int getCurrentMaxStageIndex()
      Retrieves the maximum number of stages in the current level.
      Returns:
      the number of stages in the current level.

    • getCurrentStageIndex

      public static int getCurrentStageIndex()
      Retrieves the index of the current stage.
      Returns:
      the index of the current stage.

    • loadLevelStage

      public static void loadLevelStage(MainFrame frame)
      Loads the current stage of the current level and updates the game view.
      Parameters:
      frame - the main application frame to update with the current stage panel.

    • nextStage

      public void nextStage(MainFrame frame)
      Advances to the next stage in the current level or ends the game if it is the final stage.
      Parameters:
      frame - the main application frame to update with the next stage or end screen.

    • upgradeLevel

      private void upgradeLevel()
      Upgrades the current level to the next available level if conditions are met. Updates the configuration and resets the stage index.

    • NewGame

      public static void NewGame(MainFrame frame)
      Starts a new game by resetting all progress and reinitializing the levels.
      Parameters:
      frame - the main application frame to reset and load the initial stage.
